Class Crossword

java.lang.Object
MiniPlay.Model.Crossword
public class Crossword extends Object
Manages Crossword Puzzle Game Handles grid, clues, and checks player input

      Check if entered word is correct
      Parameters:

      col - - column of starting cell
      word - - word entered by player
